package Assignment;

import java.util.ArrayList;

public class Program3{

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		ArrayList<String> colors=new ArrayList();
		
		colors.add("Pink");
		colors.add("Blue");
		colors.add("Peach");
		colors.add("Black");
		colors.add("White");
		
		System.out.println(colors);
		
		color.add(0,"Yellow");
		System.out.println(colors);

	}

}
